scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "pnpm start -w ui" "pnpm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && pnpm test --filter tests
scripts.test:sweet: pnpm run build:happ && set -x && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test -- --nocapture
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/deepkey.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
